articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: "If CSK wins, give credit to MS Dhoni; if they lose, blame Ruturaj Gaikwad": Kaif roasts Harbhajan - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Chennai Super Kings fail to beat Sunrisers Hyderabad due to poor captaincy by Ruturaj Gaikwad. Harbhajan Singh criticizes his bowling choices.
articles.content: Chennai Super Kings failed to go past Sunrisers Hyderabad at the Rajiv Hyderbad International Cricket Stadium. There was some ordinary captaincy from Ruturaj Gaikwad as he didn’t start the bowling wi… [+988 chars]

articles.title: Update on Pakistan women cricketers | Press Release - PCB
articles.description: Karachi, 6 April 2024:     The Pakistan Cricket Board has provided an update regarding two of its women players, Bismah Maroof and Ghulam Fatima, who were involved in a minor car accident...
articles.content: Karachi, 6 April 2024: The Pakistan Cricket Board has provided an update regarding two of its women players, Bismah Maroof and Ghulam Fatima, who were involved in a minor car accident on Friday eveni… [+362 chars]
